MAIN/{
void
operation(int *data, int ind1, int ind2, int value)
{
    if (ind1 != ind2) {
        int tmp1 = data[ind1] - value;
        int tmp2 = data[ind2] + value;

        data[ind1] = tmp1;
        data[ind2] = tmp2;
    }
}
}/

INPUT/{0 2 -3 4 52 6 74 8 94 4424 69 228 434 69 636 666 999 1000 12 19}/
CMD/{20 42 4 666 434 69 69 636}/
OUTPUT/{3
-64
-12
78
200
-84
-83
147
112
4362
44
245
286
-10
579
721
884
782
360
243
}/

INPUT/{10 27 -3 4 852 6 74 98 69 228 }/
CMD/{10 42 4 666 434 69 69 636}/
OUTPUT/{-12
-22
-160
-1
943

19
435
390
}/
